title: 100% Electricity from Oil
description: In 2021, Comoros produced 100% of its electricity from oil sources, indicating a complete reliance on oil for electricity generation.

title: Lowest F-gases Emissions from Industrial Processes
description: In 2023, Comoros had one of the lowest F-gases emissions from industrial processes, with only 0.0001 Mt CO2e emitted.

title: Low Revenue Mobilization Efficiency
description: In 2023, Comoros had a low CPIA efficiency of revenue mobilization rating of 2, indicating challenges in revenue collection.

title: Unfavorable Net Barter Terms of Trade
description: In 2021, Comoros had a net barter terms of trade index of 59.8, which is considered low compared to the base year 2015.
